text: In 1996, Tupac Shakur was the crown prince of West Coast rap. Traveling the road paved by hip-hop pioneers like Dr. Dre, Ice Cube, Snoop Dogg and Ice-T but also blazing his own way as an... ...... read full story
title: The Unsolved Murder of Tupac Shakur: Untangling the Epic Layers of Mystery Surrounding the Case
